name: Lost;Paradigm
description:
My first 2D platformer game where the player lays down in the grass fields with no memories why. The player awakens and tries to find answers of why you're lost.

WASD  to move  

Spacebar to jump

Gameplay video by  Button Pushin' Cushion

You can play this game on my website:              https://jvahn.github.io/lostparadigm.html
